Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Leavitt
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Leavitt, Archer, Western and 35th: due to, street blockage near 35th/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Leavitt, Archer, Western and 35th: due to, street blockage near 35th/Leavitt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays Limited Service
ShortDescription: Green Line service limited service. Shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service to Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
